pkgmetadata.longdescription: faculty-datasets-fs===================An fsspec plugin for Faculty datasets.Installation------------.. code-block:: sh pip install faculty-datasets-fsUsage-----``faculty-datasets-fs`` adds a ``faculty-datasets`` protocol that can be usedwith ``fsspec``, for example:.. code-block:: python with fsspec.open("faculty-datasets://file.txt") as fp: fp.read()``faculty-datasets-fs`` relies on environment variables and the standardFaculty credentials toolchain to determine:* The Faculty deployment to query* The Faculty project to query* Credentials to useThese will work out of the box when running within a Faculty project.
